currentTerm.title: Current Term
currentTerm.description: Parent End Date - Start Date in months

currentTCV.title: Current TCV
currentTCV.description: sum of charges from the Parent or alternatively Current ARR x Term in years

currentArr.title: Current ARR
currentArr.description: sum of the recurring amounts adjusted to be 12 months from the Parent
